column4: BRIEF-Kite Realty Group Trust Reports Q1 FFO Per Share Of $0.51

column4: BRIEF-Kite Realty Group - Kite Realty Group, Co Entered First Amendment To Fifth Amended & Restated Credit Agreement
column6: * KITE REALTY GROUP - ON APRIL 24, KITE REALTY GROUP LP, CO ENTERED FIRST AMENDMENT TO FIFTH AMENDED & RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT DATED JULY 28, 2016
column7: * KITE REALTY GROUP SAYS AMENDMENT INCREASES PRINCIPAL AMOUNT AVAILABLE UNDER UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY TO $600 MILLION - SEC FILING
column8: * KITE REALTY - AMENDMENT INCREASES AMOUNT OF LETTER OF CREDIT ISSUANCES OPERATING PARTNERSHIP MAY UTILIZE UNDER REVOLVING FACILITY TO $60 MILLION
column9: * KITE REALTY - UNDER AMENDED CREDIT AGREEMENT, OPERATING PARTNERSHIP HAS OPTION TO INCREASE REVOLVING FACILITY TO $1.2 BILLION
column10: * KITE REALTY - AMENDMENT EXTENDS SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF REVOLVING FACILITY FROM JULY 28, 2020 TO APRIL 22, 2022
column11: * KITE REALTY - AMENDMENT INCREASES SWINGLINE LOAN CAPACITY TO $60 MILLION IN SAME DAY BORROWINGS Source text: (bit.ly/2HLe4vg) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

column4: BRIEF-Daniel Sink To Step Down As CFO Of Kite Realty Group
column6: * KITE REALTY GROUP ANNOUNCES DANIEL R. SINK TO STEP DOWN AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
column7: * DANIEL SINK, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER WILL BE LEAVING COMPANY WHEN HIS EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT EXPIRES ON JUNE 30, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
